name: sightly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
attractive or pleasing to look at or see: Plastic polytunnels aren't the sightliest of agricultural buildings. The village is on a high, rolling prairie, which gives it quite a sightly position.
More examplesFewer examplesShe criticized the buildings for being no more sightly than factories.Is there anything more capable of making a house sightly than a family of birds nesting in the eaves? I had a pile of clothes needing minor repairs that were still sightly and usable.I drilled a big hole in the wall, which was not the most sightly of things.
